# Copilot Instructions

## Documentation Policy
- Do NOT create guide, overview, or documentation markdown files when making improvements or changes
- Only create documentation files if explicitly requested by the user
- Focus on implementing changes directly without additional documentation

## Code Changes
- Implement changes directly in the codebase
- Provide brief summaries in responses when needed
- Use multi_replace_string_in_file for multiple independent edits
